attributes.action: Grant the grateful British Population the chance to say Thank You to the 'Last Tommy' Harry Patch by allowing a State Funeral to be held
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that the final WW1 veteran Harry Patch has died we as a country should say Thank you for all the sacrifices made in WW1 by holding a State Funeral.
It would be a fitting tribute to a very brave group by acknowledging their sacrifice and our appreciation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
